divs: Sighting Detailssaw 3 objects hovering, each one higher than the one below and to the west of them was what seemed to be a fireball. i took a picture of the objects and the fireball and have a video of the fireball as well. was outside with the dog, always look up at the sky since we lived right by ohare airport.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Elk Grove Village
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Just Hovered there, and there were three, and to the west of them was the fireball
